page.title: 07PRUDHOE POLICE FORCE
page.content: In Prudhoe Police Station there are 16 men in uniform, 4 sergeants, 1 detective sergeant and 2 detectives. Prudhoe does not have any dogs or horses as it is not big enough, but when they are needed they are brought from other stations. It has one cell and one interview room. The most common crimes in Prudhoe are car theft and burglaries. Last year 1675 children were knocked over within the Prudhoe area. Tragic events include an old lady who was killed at Kiln Pit Hill, a man who was killed after a fight in Prudhoe and a boy who was killed in a road accident on Prudhoe Front Street.
